# vDSP_vfracD

**Function**

Truncates the elements of a double-precision vector to fractions.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_vfracD(const double * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, double * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_vfrac], except for the types of vectors `A` and C.

## Single-Vector Fractional Part Extraction

- **vDSP_vfrac**: Truncates the elements of a single-precision vector to fractions.
